title: Beginner Guide to Mountain Pose
text: Mountain pose (Tadasana) is a foundational standing posture that teaches alignment, grounding through the feet, and steady breathing. It is suitable for most beginners without acute injuries.
source: Self-written notes summarizing general yoga textbooks / blogs.

title: Benefits of Shavasana
text: Shavasana (corpse pose) is a deep relaxation posture typically practiced at the end of a session. It supports nervous system downregulation, integration of practice, and stress reduction.
source: Self-written notes referencing standard yoga teaching material.
